title: Prestige Suite
Amenities: Exclusive direct-dial service with Net-a-Porter, Sleep | Studio mattress, linens and amenities, Times Square View, Partial Central Park View, Private outdoor terrace, Full-size sofa bed, Specially-designed 400 thread SFERRA luxury linens and towels, Intelity bedside touch-screen controls, Samsung 46" HD LED television, Bespoke DayNa Decker bath and body products, Professional hair styling system by gHD featuring blow dryer ensuite and flat iron on request, two high performance products, Work desk and ergonomic chair, Dual-line telephones with conferencing capabilities, Custom-made furnishings and fittings throughout, Glass-front rain showers
seo_description: A corner location on the 21st floor affords spectacular panoramic views of the most dynamic city in the world. Expansive and enchanting, the 650 square foot Prestige Suite is flooded with great light. Rivaling all hotels in Midtown, direct views of the iconic Times Square Ball are enjoyed from the privileged perspective of a private outdoor terrace seating up to six. Interiors boast a King bedroom outfitted by premiere sleep innovator Sleep | Studio, furnished with an adjustable bedding system to provide maximum support and comfort. With original, one-of-a-kind furnishings, the separate living room is beautifully decorated to evoke 1920s glamour with touches of Art Deco, while a marble bathroom indulges the senses with luxurious space.
